metadata.title: CVE-2022-43598 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple memory corruption vulnerabilities exist in the IFFOutput alignmentpadding functionality of OpenImageIO Project OpenImageIO v2.4.4.2. Aspecially crafted ImageOutput Object can lead to arbitrary code execution.An attacker can provide malicious input to trigger thesevulnerabilities.This vulnerability arises when the `m_spec.format` is`TypeDesc::UINT16`.

criterions.comment: openimageio package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
